659606028.reviewBody: Playa la Ropa is so great. The beach is super clean and nice. Tons of different places to choose from.

659368567.name: Great beach, can be a tad busy
659368567.author: a TripAdvisor user
659368567.reviewBody: A very comfortably laid back place to spend time.\nLot\'s to do, great restaurants, activities, very popular on a Sunday!

658669505.name: Great beach
658669505.author: a TripAdvisor user
658669505.reviewBody: Our favorite beach and according to Condense Naste it is the best in Mexico. Plenty of places to eat and drink. We loved the Hotel Mexicana but unfortunately they were fully booked. Right on the beach so not surprising it is popular. It is a great walking beach and we would walk from our hotel in the next bay along .playa de Ropa to Gatos. A great way to waste a few hours with a drink or 2 and something to eat and a swim followed by drying of in 85 degrees as it was last week.

657859937.name: Best Beach!
657859937.author: a TripAdvisor user
657859937.reviewBody: We visiting Zihuatanejo annually and totally enjoy coming to La Ropa beach.  Great sand, warm waters, safe for kids.  Not much to complain about. The vendors walking the sand are respectful and some of them even have wares worth taking home. We love La Perla restaurant on the sand, food and drinks are great and the staff is consistent. We look forward to doing it all again soon!

656830625.name: Beautiful water
656830625.author: a TripAdvisor user
656830625.reviewBody: Enjoyed a day on this quiet little beach. Great place to stroll, snack, and grab a massage. Rented a cabana for the day.

656780646.name: A beautiful beach
656780646.author: a TripAdvisor user
656780646.reviewBody: While it can be busy over the Christmas season, February is a great month to visit. There are water sports for enthusiasts, but it is also a great place to just walk, swim and have lunch.

656157281.name: great swimming beach
656157281.author: a TripAdvisor user
656157281.reviewBody: A quiet, mile long beach for enjoying the warm water, the cold drinks and the terrific food. There is even a small lagoon area to observe iguanas and crocodiles. Rosy\'s is the place to sit, as they won\'t charge you for the lounge chairs. Not the place to go snorkeling, but rather swimming. And watching the parasailers can be entertaining too.

656124614.name: Beautiful bay!
656124614.author: a TripAdvisor user
656124614.reviewBody: Bay closest to town for swimming in Zihuatenejo.  Water not always clean,some floating garbage in waves at times but this has improved in last 5 years.  Water temp in this part of Pacific is balmy, usually over 25 degrees Celsius.  Great walkway all along beach that is under construction after a big storm a few years back, so a bit noisy right now.  In Feb. the bay is full of sailboats for some fundraising regattas so very picturesque.  Boogie boarding ok at times.  There are restaurants on beach, u can pay a bit for food and drinks all day and stay.  There is a massage hut with good prices and staff.  Beach things for sale on beach if u did not bring.  Nice place to exercise, great sunsets!

654769384.name: Considered the best beach
654769384.author: a TripAdvisor user
654769384.reviewBody: This is a beautiful sandy beach about 1 kilometre long.Many hotels and restaurants along the beach. Also you can rent snorkeling gear or have a massage. The massage I had was the best I have ever had. 50 minutes  for $18. \nThe water is warm and very swim able.

654409416.name: Beauty by the Bay
654409416.author: a TripAdvisor user
654409416.reviewBody: Quiet mile long beach in a beautiful bay.  Great for walking, swimming, sea kayaking and paddle boarding with many fun restaurants where you can eat with your feet in the sand and listen to the waves while watching a magnificent sunset.

654365087.name: Best beach in Zihua
654365087.author: a TripAdvisor user
654365087.reviewBody: You be at this beach everyday and have a new experience. Restaurants, servers, locals are all very friendly. Very inexpensive.

651919815.name: Great spot to swim
651919815.author: a TripAdvisor user
651919815.reviewBody: Spent a day at Playa la ropa and loved the area. Beach was awesome and the best part was the water. Able to swim, minor waves as opposed the Ixtapa beaches. Lots of space to relax. Can rent shade or buy beer from them 160 pesos for 6 beer a fair deal and free shade. Lots of options for food and beers. We would be interested in staying in this area next visit or at the least return for a few visits.

651848945.name: great beach
651848945.author: a TripAdvisor user
651848945.reviewBody: Good swimming and good beach for a jog\ntoo bad for the squarkers\nlots of places to eat and sit under a tress and veg

651591239.name: gorgeous beach
651591239.author: a TripAdvisor user
651591239.reviewBody: we loved visiting playa la ropa, but next time, we are coming during the shoulder season to have it all to ourselves !

651280974.name: It would be perfect if it weren\'t such a scene
651280974.author: a TripAdvisor user
651280974.reviewBody: Playa Ropa is a long beautiful beach. It would be paradise if it were not so peopled. That being said it is wonderful, but lined chock-a-block with restaurants, hotels and massage tents. From early morn before the sun gets brutal, you will find gringos doing their morning constitutional. In afternoon, Mexican families play in the surf and white gringo bodies turn pink and brown.  Parasailors beckon for your business. Evening once again brings the walkers.  You can sit all day drinking margaritas at any number of restaurants and have an excellent fish meal.  The swimming is great in the morning as the water is calm but then the day breeze seems to pick up, even though the bay is somewhat protected. Serious swimmers can get a good work out beyond the breaking surf.

650735615.name: Beautiful beach!
650735615.author: a TripAdvisor user
650735615.reviewBody: Love this beach and all the activities. The water is beautiful and the beach is so nice!! We hope to snorkel today!

650730917.name: Cool off in the Breezes!
650730917.author: a TripAdvisor user
650730917.reviewBody: La Ropa is a fun beach to go to to lie in the shade of an umbrella and enjoy the sweet breezes in the heat of the day. I went parasailing with my granddaughter and had a ball! We had massages three times. The price varies from 200-250 pesos and the massages were excellent. We rented chairs at Arena, a great beach restaurant for 100 pesos each for the whole day. Carlos, the waiter in the ball cap, is our favourite. He\'s very attentive and friendly and the restaurant food is good.

650615724.name: Crowded
650615724.author: a TripAdvisor user
650615724.reviewBody: Americanos and Canadians...barely Mexican, which makes it much less interesting and fun.  First here 25 years ago, and last here 10 years ago.  Would stay again at Residencias Villa del Sol and eat at Paty\'s if I were coming back.

648804964.name: Beautiful
648804964.author: a TripAdvisor user
648804964.reviewBody: Beautiful beach in Zihuatanejo . Lots of restaurants, easy to walk the beach, very clean.\nThe water in the bay is much calmer than in Ixtapa.

648576254.name: Soft gentle waves
648576254.author: a TripAdvisor user
648576254.reviewBody: If going to the beach means needing to actually be IN the water-this it IT!  Very hospitable water.  La Ropa is not a dazzling "see and be seen" place for super star people, but a real, down to earth beach where you can enjoy the beauty of the natural environment.

648424553.name: Beautiful beach
648424553.author: a TripAdvisor user
648424553.reviewBody: Lots of great restaurants where you can eat and drink with your toes in the sand. Parasailing and seadoo rentals. Crocodile sanctuary.

647961897.name: Perfect beach
647961897.author: a TripAdvisor user
647961897.reviewBody: This is a beautiful long beach with soft sand,  no coral, reasonable waves, altohugh there is moderate undertow and great views

647868054.name: Fantastic "short" beach walk
647868054.author: a TripAdvisor user
647868054.reviewBody: The beach walk is very nice and is about a half mile (full mile from end to end). Interesting buildings and a fantastic view west to the Pacific all along the crecent beach. Very clean and well\nmaintained. This is the beach the locals go to on the weekend!

647786582.name: Beautiful beach!
647786582.author: a TripAdvisor user
647786582.reviewBody: One of the prettiest beaches that we have seen in Mexico. Beautiful scenery around a horseshoe bay. Many beach restaurants to choose from. Low-key vibe. Buy a drink or some food & stay all day under an umbrella or palapa. What\u2019s not to like?

646834537.name: Fun beach
646834537.author: a TripAdvisor user
646834537.reviewBody: Many days we chose a beach restaurant and spend a few hours drinking, relaxing and getting some food.  Often we rent kayaks and paddle to Las Gatas beach for a change of scenery.

646814322.name: Loud and busy!
646814322.author: a TripAdvisor user
646814322.reviewBody: Busy beach during holidays and weekends.  Not really a great place to spend the day if you are looking to relax. The water is good for swimming here, clear with a sandy bottom.

646572189.name: Beautiful beach
646572189.author: a TripAdvisor user
646572189.reviewBody: The beach is great. Sandy bottom, mild surf. Nice swimming. Lots of bars and restaurants and not too much sales push on the beach. Bars pricey compared to Playa Las Gatas. 40 p/beer compared to 25 at Las Gatas.

645998762.name: Spectacular
645998762.author: a TripAdvisor user
645998762.reviewBody: Vast, gorgeous, very swimmable white sand beach edged with a characterful neighbourhood of good bars and restaurants. Worth visiting even just to watch the diving pelicans. Affordable by taxi to/from Ixtapa.

645614826.name: Best beach in Zee!
645614826.author: a TripAdvisor user
645614826.reviewBody: Busy on the weekends, but lots of room. It\u2019s about 1.3 km of Sandy beach to walk on. Lots of places to eat. Loved it!

644827974.name: Day at the beach
644827974.author: a TripAdvisor user
644827974.reviewBody: What a great place to spend a couple of days with friends enjoying the surf, food from local vendors and some of the nicest people you can meet.

644123810.name: Great Beach
644123810.author: a TripAdvisor user
644123810.reviewBody: I\'ve been told by Mexicans that this is the best all-around beach on the Pacific side of Mexico. It certainly is clean, there are plenty of small hotels with varying prices and it\'s close to downtown Zihuatanejo. I\'ve stayed at this beach four times over the last 10 years.

644052836.name: Hidden Gem
644052836.author: a TripAdvisor user
644052836.reviewBody:
Love the beach here
The water is amazing 
Smooth fine sand
Ride the swells & enjoy the Ocean
Many lovely beach restaurants serving delicious local fare!
Beach chairs provided if you eat & drink at the restaurants here.
Mostly Pesos accepted
Some take credit 
Be good to these people 
They will take excellent care of you
Show your Graditude & Respect 🥰

643774555.name: Warm sandy beach
643774555.author: a TripAdvisor user
643774555.reviewBody: Playa la Ropa is a lovely sandy beach with warm water perfect for lounging. There is snorkeling available off the beach. There can be a current so take care.

642910601.name: Playa La Ropa is the real deal
642910601.author: a TripAdvisor user
642910601.reviewBody: The Ixtapa / Zihuatanejo area is no stranger to tourist traps. The much vaunted boat trips to Playa Las Gatas and Isla de Ixtapa will make you a prisoner of the fairly mediocre restaurants, which charge you just for using their precious air, in crowded tiny beaches, of which the decent ones are for snorkeling, meaning rocky bottoms and prickly corals. But La Ropa is public, easy to access, and unbeatable. Perfect water temperature, white sand, no rocks whatsoever, just what you see in beer commercials, only in real life.

642854592.name: Very busy over the holidays
642854592.author: a TripAdvisor user
642854592.reviewBody: A very large beach, great sunset views. Can rent hobies, open kayaks, parasail, etc. Lots of places to eat. Amazing how some reviews talk about this beach not being busy; during the Christmas holidays it is packed from late morning til night. Not Coney Island in 1920, but a lot of people!

640784843.name: Great for a morning walk or run
640784843.author: a TripAdvisor user
640784843.reviewBody: La Ropa is a long beach with many restauraunts and hotels. It is a great place for a morning walk or run as it usually does not get crowded until afternoon.

639767515.name: Beautiful beach, warm water and nice people!
639767515.author: a TripAdvisor user
639767515.reviewBody: We went to La Perla on the beach a couple of times and both the service and location on this beautiful stretch of beach was perfect for us.  The sunsets are stunning !

639407840.name: Always and forever
639407840.author: a TripAdvisor user
639407840.reviewBody: My favorite place on Earth. It\'s changed a bit since I first visited in 1985, but remains well cared for and serene. Best beach, calm but not too quiet, nature and local business have treated it well.

638046856.name: Once a quiet village beach is now found
638046856.author: a TripAdvisor user
638046856.reviewBody: This beach is now very popular with locals.  The south end is almost all local Mexicans especially on the weekends.  The north end is much quieter and fun for tourists.  The restaurants are good.  No cost to use the beach.  The kayaking is fun.

637477713.name: Beautiful beach
637477713.author: a TripAdvisor user
637477713.reviewBody: We loved our trip to playa la ropa. A few were selling trinkets and food items. But nothing overwhelming or annoying. The water is warm and clean.

637332311.name: Beautiful White sand beach
637332311.author: a TripAdvisor user
637332311.reviewBody: Quiet Beach - Great for walking, massages for $15 US, restaurants, playing in the water as well water sports.  Something for everyone.

636317828.name: Nothing but great things!
636317828.author: a TripAdvisor user
636317828.reviewBody: Great beach to walk, swim, enjoy a cheap and wonderful massage, have a few drinks and great food.  We loved hanging out on Playa La Ropa.  Started and ended trip at Paty\'s.  Hung out for a day at La Perla.  Would have enjoyed trying Manglar but it was closed the day we were there.  Tons of things to do and awesome sugar sand and warm water.

635926279.name: Very nice beach.
635926279.author: a TripAdvisor user
635926279.reviewBody: It\u2019s a long way down from the road but there\u2019s a well developed path that\u2019s paved & cars can go down for drop off but there\u2019s no parking there. Another route is to drive farther to the dolphins roundabout & then turn towards the water. Parking is on the street. Many restaurants & hotels are along this route. Like many beaches in M\u00e9xico you can eat or drink at a restaurant and they let you sit there all day. Waves are not high, very swimmable.

632635561.name: One of the best beaches we\'ve seen
632635561.author: a TripAdvisor user
632635561.reviewBody: Moderate waves, warm water, clean beaches, 120 pesos to rent an umbrella and a couple of chairs for the day.  We had a lot of fun on this beach.  Lots of restaurants to choose from.  The vendors are respectful.  Excellent beach.

632581599.name: Top 10 beach
632581599.author: a TripAdvisor user
632581599.reviewBody: Can you ask for a better beach?  Gentle waves, ocean temp like bath water, one of the best views in the world, friendly people, lots to do, very reasonable prices. Can\u2019t beat La Ropa.

631214703.name: The beach
631214703.author: a TripAdvisor user
631214703.reviewBody: We hung out at Patty\u2019s on the beach. Good food, good location!  The staff is very friendly. The water/bay is great. I believe this to be the nicest area of Z.

629718406.name: great beach to walk
629718406.author: a TripAdvisor user
629718406.reviewBody: We left our resort and walked down past restaurants and resorts on the beautiful beach.  We also walked above La Ropa and some really neat small hotels.

629205183.name: Beautiful beach!
629205183.author: a TripAdvisor user
629205183.reviewBody: This beach trails the riviera maya in beauty but certainly is one beautiful beach and the wonderful cove provides amazing panoramic sunsets. What a great!

627058940.name: Nice beach
627058940.author: a TripAdvisor user
627058940.reviewBody: Crowded and a lot of "salespeople" but pretty with a lot to do. If you\'re looking for a way to spend the afternoon it\'s pretty good.

622755816.name: the beach where Villa del Sol is located
622755816.author: a TripAdvisor user
622755816.reviewBody: it\'s a calm and beautiful beach with water sports if you like or just swimming and body surfing, great food opportunities, amazing sunsets, nature and life. great people, great place.

622723291.name: Too many massage tents
622723291.author: a TripAdvisor user
622723291.reviewBody: La Ropa used to so pretty, now so many run down tents of massage places. Very few places to sit in chaise lounge without paying. You used to just order drinks or food and sit all day. Disappointed.

621094853.name: Warm water, soft sands and enough waves for fun.
621094853.author: a TripAdvisor user
621094853.reviewBody: Was suprised at how warm the water was.  Nice breeze.  Waves small enough for children but  large enough for fun.

616021198.name: Beautiful beach
616021198.author: a TripAdvisor user
616021198.reviewBody: Snorkeling, swimming and beer on the beach.  Easy walk from one end to the other.  Palm trees provide a lot of shade.

614830095.name: Great beach
614830095.author: a TripAdvisor user
614830095.reviewBody: Great beach with lots of restaurants along it. Great sand, I didn\'t see and seaweed and we stayed at the embarc resort for the week and I didn\'t see anyone rake up seaweed. Great for running.

614477370.name: Good
614477370.author: a TripAdvisor user
614477370.reviewBody: Very nice beach.  Love the restaurant. I recommend the massages, ceviche, and micheladas. Be sure you take some long walks on the beach.

611466365.name: Beautiful place for sun, sand and pampering
611466365.author: a TripAdvisor user
611466365.reviewBody: On a trip with two couples. Stayed at the Viceroy and loved this beautiful beach. Great sand and surf. Not overcrowded. Idyllic sunsets.

609897941.name: Nice beach
609897941.author: a TripAdvisor user
609897941.reviewBody: Enjoyed our day on this nice long uncrowded beach. Water was a bit rough. Had a great massage on the beach. Would recommend a day at La Ropa beach

603633159.name: A Paradise to Soothe the Soul
603633159.author: a TripAdvisor user
603633159.reviewBody: I went to Playa la Ropa for one week during the Easter holidays staying at an Airbnb with a 2 minute walk to the beach. Then I returned some 3 weeks later to stay a further week in a local hotel right on the beach with the most amazing swimming pool, and beautiful views across the bay from the balcony. The beach during Easter obviously was very busy with people but that was all part of the enjoyment. Lots of good places to eat right on the beach. Very friendly area and an easy 15 minute walk into the beautiful charming fishing village of Zihuatanejo. \n [see-wah-tah-neh-ho].

595980792.name: Away from the Madding Crowd
595980792.author: a TripAdvisor user
595980792.reviewBody: Lovely beach, very tourist friendly, great walking and snorkelling area. Lots of small beach restaurants and places to sip cheap Mexican beer. Great massages at extremely reasonable prices. We stayed in a VRBO two blocks above La Ropa with an amazing view. Will go back again and again.

594678640.name: unspoiled old Mexico!
594678640.author: a TripAdvisor user
594678640.reviewBody: This charming, beautiful, paradise is void of high rise buildings and fast food restaurants, just laid back little beach spots to sit and eat or have a drink and watch the surf roll in over the fine white sand. \nTruly a great spot and our destination this winter.

586299452.name: Couple
586299452.author: a TripAdvisor user
586299452.reviewBody: Wonderful beach with great massages and unbelievably good food...very family friendly, and Very reasonable

585207321.name: So few tourists and so many locals looking to make money from them.
585207321.author: a TripAdvisor user
585207321.reviewBody: Don\'t go here if you can help it. The people who work th beach there will just rip you off if they think they can get away with it. Also, the sewage water from Zihuatanejo washes ashore on the beach and you are covered in greenish slime.

583492588.name: One of the best
583492588.author: a TripAdvisor user
583492588.reviewBody: One quiet, relaxing  beach. We enjoyed the walks and the swimming in the warm water. The view from our hotel was amazing.

581211318.name: BEST BEACH IN ZIHUA
581211318.author: a TripAdvisor user
581211318.reviewBody: Beautiful Beach!  Many great food vendors, beach bars, restaurants to choose from.  Easy walk from end to end and you NEED to stop the ice cream man for  a scoop of home made ice cream.

578099192.name: Small short beach with wonderful restaurants all along it
578099192.author: a TripAdvisor user
578099192.reviewBody: This is a wonderful little beach with several restaurant choices along it, inexpensive and usually very good. Fun to have eats with toes in the sand, and can turn the kids loose to play while adults do their thing. Also unusual to be overcrowded here too.

576514175.name: Great beach for relaxing and fun in the sun
576514175.author: a TripAdvisor user
576514175.reviewBody: An expansive beach utilized by locals and tourists.  Many restaurant selections and many beach activities such as parasailing, banana boats, jet skis, and sailing.  Amidst all that, one is still able to relax at one of the restaurants that offer table service at your chaise lounge situated within a few feet from the water and all reasonably priced.  We spent most of the week here.

575291650.name: Vacation
575291650.author: a TripAdvisor user
575291650.reviewBody: Beautiful calm beach\nEasy to get into and out of the water nice flat Sand restaurants on the beach you can rent chairs and umbrellas

575289366.name: Great beach for a day in the sun
575289366.author: a TripAdvisor user
575289366.reviewBody: Playa La Ropa is a perfect family beach....but not a surfing beach.  If you\'re staying at Embarc, or any other place on la Ropa....it\'s right out your front door.  No real surf, but fishing, kayaks and a few jet skis and hobie cats are available.

574435524.name: Best beach in Zi
574435524.author: a TripAdvisor user
574435524.reviewBody:
This is the nicest in my opinion in Zi. Ixtapa could be different with Playa Quieta. Expect easy surf and little undertow. Water is mostly clear and few hidden rocks. Easy access to water and n steep drop off. Can get busy with locals on the weekends and holidays. But what does that tell you? They know what’s up. 
 Some vendors pushing massages and tours, but they accept a polite no thank you. 

 Enjoy a walk between 7 & 8 am or at sunset 12 hours later. Lots of restaurants to choose from for a beer or snacks or dinner.

573715192.name: Beautiful Beach
573715192.author: a TripAdvisor user
573715192.reviewBody: If you want a beach that has great soft sand, shallow water and clean surroundings go to Playa La Ropa! This beach is long and has lots of restaurant/bar options. It never feels crowded during the week. You can\'t beat relaxing in the sun or shade on this beautiful beach.

570517166.name: Vacation
570517166.author: a TripAdvisor user
570517166.reviewBody: Embarc resorts in Zi is a great clean place to relax and enjoy the ocean. With great staff and restaurants. Our last time here was several years ago and it was great then also. \n

570284386.name: Beautiful beach with friendly, helpful vendors
570284386.author: a TripAdvisor user
570284386.reviewBody: This is not your typical gorgeous beach.  We had to take a lovely boat ride (at a very reasonable price) to reach this beautiful sandy beach.  When we arrived, every restaurant offered us beach chairs, hoping to get our business.  We stayed in beach chairs at one of the restaurants all day.  It was truly lovely.

569585185.name: Great beach for everyone
569585185.author: a TripAdvisor user
569585185.reviewBody: Lovely beach, great for sunbathing or swimming. Only negative is the current construction of apartments taking place creating some noise.

569339624.name: Beautiful beach great for families
569339624.author: a TripAdvisor user
569339624.reviewBody: Beautiful large beach with calm waves, not too rough for little kids, warm water, clean sand, and very safe

569138493.name: Excellent beach
569138493.author: a TripAdvisor user
569138493.reviewBody: This was our first trip to Zihua, but I don\'t think it will be our last. This beach is really nice, great sand, clear, warm water, the bay provides a lot of protection so the waves are enough to be fun but not so much as to be a problem for kids or less proficient swimmers. It\'s a great walking beach with plenty of room to walk on the packed sand, but the dry sand does get pretty hot and you need footwear to walk in or across it. There is a nice variety of restaurants to get a snack or a drink, and enough vendors if you\'re looking for an activity or souvenir, but it\'s not like Playa de los Muertos up in Puerto Vallarta where you\'re constantly saying no to a vendor. The walk over from our hotel on Playa la Madera wasn\'t bad, and if you want to go anywhere from here, there is a whole fleet of taxis waiting just up the street. This beach was really nice and clean, with plenty of room for everyone, I hope it stays that way.

567994768.name: Great beach
567994768.author: a TripAdvisor user
567994768.reviewBody:
Playa La Ropa is a pretty sandy beach in Zihuatanejo Bay - nice sand , pleasant to walk-
Great swimming with little waves and no swift 
Currents - perfect for young children.
Beachfront restaurants add all that is required for
A perfect day at the beach - good local food and beverages !

567260541.name: Simply put, one of the most fun, beautiful beaches to walk in The World
567260541.author: a TripAdvisor user
567260541.reviewBody: You walk past beautiful Hotels, great restaurants, a massage for $20.00 for an hour or many places to stop in and have a favorite drink.

567069472.name: Best Beach
567069472.author: a TripAdvisor user
567069472.reviewBody: Best beach I have ever been on. Goes forever. Light waves. Wam water and not a lot of peddlers.  Very relaxing place to be.

567024874.name: The sand is like silk
567024874.author: a TripAdvisor user
567024874.reviewBody:
We spent 3 hours at La Ropa, renting chairs and an umbrella at la perla. $120 peso.
Well worth the money to have shade.
The beach is smooth and the water is clear. This beach had a balance of locals and tourists and was not crazy busy.
The water is beautiful and you don't need water shoes, no rocks just smooth and warm.
It was delightful to see people of all ages frolic in the water and enjoy making sand castles.
We had lunch (reasonable)on the beach which was nice.
We took a taxi from our hotel it would have been difficult to find on our own.

566747276.name: Great Beach
566747276.author: a TripAdvisor user
566747276.reviewBody: Lots of Friendly Services and water is fairly calm most of the time. Water not as clear as Ixtapa Island, but easier to access from Zihua.

566721394.name: Best Beach
566721394.author: a TripAdvisor user
566721394.reviewBody: This beach offers it all playing, walking, eating, snorkeling, swimming. This is the best beach in Zihua and we have stayed on others and will only stay on La Ropa (Catalina).

566694186.name: Spend all Day!
566694186.author: a TripAdvisor user
566694186.reviewBody: This beach has great sand, lots of space, and lots to do. It is full of restaurants to enjoy, massage and spa options, parasailing, water toys, etc.

566468760.name: Absolutely paradise
566468760.author: a TripAdvisor user
566468760.reviewBody: This beach is gorgeous! The waves are very gentle and the water is warm, you can stay in the ocean all day! The restaurants are all along the beach and if you buy food or drinks, you can use the sun loungers for free. Definitely check out this little piece of paradise.

565945170.name: We go every year. Beautiful, safe and fun for family
565945170.author: a TripAdvisor user
565945170.reviewBody: We go every year. The town is safe and friendly. \n\nAll the services you\u2019d want. And not too busy. We always feel at home

565928874.name: Paradise!
565928874.author: a TripAdvisor user
565928874.reviewBody: This is the best beach for youngsters thru to elderly!the waves are gentle, and the water is warm, and-bottom is sandy! The beach is quite clean,  I\u2019m sure you will enjoy this beach

565915834.name: Good beach
565915834.author: a TripAdvisor user
565915834.reviewBody:
Long and large beach in the Zihua bay bordered with all class restaurants.
Positive point are the numerous masssage stand where you can be relaxed at a very reasonnable price (200 mxn for 1 hour).
You should opt for an isolated one to avoid noise from the next massage stand).

565634507.name: Beautiful beach
565634507.author: a TripAdvisor user
565634507.reviewBody: It is a long sandy beach with available activity rentals and restaurant options.  It was not busy at all.. even though it was peak season

565297994.name: Living on the Playa.
565297994.author: a TripAdvisor user
565297994.reviewBody: Great beach for walking ,lounging,eating, swimming and all sorts of activities. It has a good solid bottom where the waves have pack it which makes for very easy walking. Lots of great restaurants and accommodation directly off the beach.

565181750.name: One of the best bays to visit
565181750.author: a TripAdvisor user
565181750.reviewBody: This is just outside of the town of Zihuatanejo.  The beach is one of the best in the world.  Great sand.  Warm clean water in a fairly protected bay with great views from above

564084594.name: Great beach with lots to do.
564084594.author: a TripAdvisor user
564084594.reviewBody: Playa La Ropa is a great beach, with good swimming and the best massages. You can walk, swim, enjoy the many restaurants, banana boat, parasail or just grab a lounge which are free if you purchase food or drink & relax. A cab from town is 50 pesos. Enjoy:)

563148688.name: Beautiful beach
563148688.author: a TripAdvisor user
563148688.reviewBody: Perfect beach. Great for walking on as sand at waters edge is flat and hard. Good restaurants. Had best ever massage here. Going back every day.

563062824.name: Beautiful beach
563062824.author: a TripAdvisor user
563062824.reviewBody: Playa La Ropa is a beautiful beach close to Zhihuatenejo. Great for swimming  with gentle waves.\n You can rent a beach chair andan umbrella and eat at one of the beach restaurants.\nGo on a week day. Weekends tend to be busy.

562153415.name: wide beatiful sand beach
562153415.author: a TripAdvisor user
562153415.reviewBody: One of the best places to snorkel from the beach that we have found on the Pacific coast. Isla Ixtapa is better, but you need to take the boat out to it.[$3.00 return]

560747902.name: Very nice beach
560747902.author: a TripAdvisor user
560747902.reviewBody: We are staying at the Embarc resort. The beach is very nice, the water is warm, and it is very clean. We were walking on the beach on a daily basis.  You are not getting solicited to buy anything on the beach. I did snorkelling and there is a lot of fish near the rock at the end of the beach. The water is clear.

560422637.name: Pirata or Mary
560422637.author: a TripAdvisor user
560422637.reviewBody: LaRopa beach Has many restaurants but these 2 are by far the best. The service and atmosphere it both make your stay on LA ropa charming.

560090146.name: Beautiful Beach
560090146.author: a TripAdvisor user
560090146.reviewBody: This is the best Beach along the Bay. There are restaurants where one can eat and have drinks while enjoying the day.

559665355.name: Nice beach
559665355.author: a TripAdvisor user
559665355.reviewBody: Beach is nicer and cleaner part of the Zihuatanejo bay where there is lots of pollution. Can be very crowded on weekends and Mexican holidays. Good restaurants along the beach. Lots of activity in early Feb with the Sailfest andagain,in early March with guitafest in town. Accessible by cheap collectivo buses from town, cost is 8 1/2 pesos.

559662712.name: Bahia hermosa!
559662712.author: a TripAdvisor user
559662712.reviewBody: La Ropa is a lovely beach.  Great for walking.  Not very crowded.  Fantastic sunsets.  Beware of the mediocre restaurants catering to tourists.

559405260.name: Disappointed in La Perla
559405260.author: a TripAdvisor user
559405260.reviewBody: Yes Playa La Ropa beach is very nice and most of the hotels have chairs and lounges to use free when ordering drinks or/and food. Unfortunately we stopped at La Perla we sat down and ordered drinks for the 4 of us. As they were bring our drinks one of the staff came out and requested 120 pesos for the use of the the chairs and umbrella. And then trying to get every penny from the tourists they stated that the 120 peso charge was for an umbrella 1 small table , 2 sitting chairs and  1 lounge chair not enough chairs for all  of us, of course there was an extra charge for the 4th chair.  So beware of where you decide to sit.

559303489.name: Low key and easy
559303489.author: a TripAdvisor user
559303489.reviewBody: I like this beach probably the most out of all the beaches in Zihua because how calm it is but also has a lot of restaurant options to choose from and how easy walking distance it is to town, too

558895111.name: This beach is lovely
558895111.author: a TripAdvisor user
558895111.reviewBody: Our hotel was on this beach and it\'s your quintessential beach. Water was 82 degrees, a view to die for, sand, massages or water activities available, not very crowded and just pretty darn sweet.

558454221.name: Beautiful and Safe
558454221.author: a TripAdvisor user
558454221.reviewBody: We have vacationed here for over 10 years, walking daily, stopping at various restaurants to enjoy breakfast lunch and dinner. Always safe and friendly, happy vendors that dont hassle you too much.

558351244.name: A great walk and view, with lots to do if you want!
558351244.author: a TripAdvisor user
558351244.reviewBody: A wonderful beach with beautiful people and plenty to do--without the crowds!  There are water activities, spa tents with great massages etc, soft sand, lots of restaurants, and plenty of amazing views!  Don\'t miss this place on your trip.

558132436.name: Love to walk Playa La Ropa ....
558132436.author: a TripAdvisor user
558132436.reviewBody: Every time we go to Zihua, we make at least 2 or 3 trips to La Ropa to hang out on the beach, to walk, to eat in the restaurants and to people watch.

557929284.name: Nice beach
557929284.author: a TripAdvisor user
557929284.reviewBody:
It wasn't as good as I was expecting as I had read about it before our trip to Mexico.  

In my opinion the Ixtapa beach is nicer despite the high rise hotels.

It's certainly worth a visit though

557767295.name: Nice beach
557767295.author: a TripAdvisor user
557767295.reviewBody: slightly more touristy than La Madeira, but more things like para-speedboating or whatever it is.  The pelicans are fun to watch.  There are little tiny fish everywhere. Water is really warm.

557132903.name: one kilometre of pleasantness
557132903.author: a TripAdvisor user
557132903.reviewBody:
We walked the beach every morning between 7 and 8 a.m. before the sun comes up over the hill to the east. It is cool and the light is soft. 
Fishermen cast nets from shore and from their small boats just off shore. Egrets, pelicans and small gulls dive for fish. 
There are a number of great restaurants to eat at. There are lots of activity and rental opportunities for water sports.
There are only a few hawkers and they are very polite and mild-mannered. 
The beach is not huge but it is lined with palm trees, a few mangroves and the waves are gentle. It is a very pleasant place to spend time.

556784068.name: Peaceful, relaxing and revitalizing
556784068.author: a TripAdvisor user
556784068.reviewBody: This small beach in Mexico is amazing - the sand is swept clean each morning by the shop keepers - you can observe the local people fishing both from the small boats and with nets. It is so beautiful to enjoy the sunset from any of the restaurants.... so relaxing - I\'ll be back!

556706206.name: Wonderful friendly beach
556706206.author: a TripAdvisor user
556706206.reviewBody: La Perla at Playa La Ropa is a great place to spend a day at the beach, warm water with gentle waves, friendly and low key. Good food and drinks.

556405599.name: Popular spot to spend a day!
556405599.author: a TripAdvisor user
556405599.reviewBody: We recently spent two weeks in a resort on Paya la Ropa.  It was a wonderful beach on which to spend hours soaking up the sun, playing in the sea or enjoying one of many beachside restaurants.  We were offered goods (jewelry, pottery, etc.) and services (massages, fishing trips, food, etc.) by locals, but little pressure so it was never uncomfortable.  We\'ll definitely be back!

556189265.name: Sunsets to satisfy everyone
556189265.author: a TripAdvisor user
556189265.reviewBody: Both ends of the beach from Embark to Rossi\'s experience their own unique sunset with La Perla probably in the ideal location in the centre of La Ropa. All good places to share a margarita and look for that elusive "green flash" which I have never seen.

556116499.name: Zihuatanejo
556116499.author: a TripAdvisor user
556116499.reviewBody: 5 girlfriends had a lovely week in zihuatanejo. Awesome place at Casa Camilla, complete with infinity pool and our own Perro, watch dog!  We all felt very safe in the casa, at the beach and around town. Would define my do this again!

556005463.name: Very nice beach!
556005463.author: a TripAdvisor user
556005463.reviewBody: This is one of the nicest if not the nicest beach in Zihuatanejo. It\u2019s nice and long and flat and good for walking or running. The waves are fun to swim in and body surf. There are a few restaurants and bars on the beach and chairs and umbrellas to rent for the day.

555636295.name: La Ropa beach is fun in the sun!
555636295.author: a TripAdvisor user
555636295.reviewBody: Our family and friends have visited this beach every year since 2003! You\u2019ll find parasailing, jet skis, hobicat, paddle boards, fishing excursions and more. Always a treat to swim in the ocean water! Fun in the sun!  Be sure to check out one of the many local eateries along the beachfront!

555629903.name: One of the best beaches on the Mexican pacific coast.
555629903.author: a TripAdvisor user
555629903.reviewBody: While not as pristine as beaches in the Caribbean this is a worth while stop. Lots of sea life but the water is a little dirty from all the people the come to this beautiful beach

555627511.name: Playa La Ropa is our favorite place to hang out and chill!
555627511.author: a TripAdvisor user
555627511.reviewBody: We have been going to Playa la Ropa for the past 11 years. We love it there. It has a nice sandy beach and the water is great. There are many places on the beach to rent chairs and umbrellas. many of the places serve food and drinks. It is just so relaxing. We usually go in November. it is a good time to go. Perfect weather and not too many people around. We have never had a single problem there.

555302930.name: Nice and Mellow
555302930.author: a TripAdvisor user
555302930.reviewBody: Just a few vendors, water activities were inexpensive....a great escape from the Cabos and Cancuns of the world! Cant beat the beachside massages!

554998231.name: Amazing beach and sunset
554998231.author: a TripAdvisor user
554998231.reviewBody: This is a beautiful little beach which seems to capture some incredible sunsets. Not very touristy and more of an authentic Mexican feel to the area.

554784689.name: Great
554784689.author: a TripAdvisor user
554784689.reviewBody: Best beach ever!! Been going there for years!! Very lovely. The Catalina sky bar is perfect at sunset and snokling if nice near the Embarc hotel. La pearl has yummy food. There is tons to see and do but also is very relaxing and non resort like!

554756482.name: Best beach we found
554756482.author: a TripAdvisor user
554756482.reviewBody: We would have our taxi take us to La Perla restaurant at la Ropa beach.  For 120 pesos you get an umbrella on the beach with three chairs and a table.  The service was amazing, the food was ok, not great.  The beach was peaceful, if we ever come back we will stay in this area instead of Ixtapa.

554514936.name: Favorite beach in Zihua
554514936.author: a TripAdvisor user
554514936.reviewBody: During our stay at Zihua, we tried to sample as many of the local beaches as we could, and La Ropa easily became our favorite.  For us, the surf was big enough to be entertaining but didn\u2019t pummel us like the surf at Ixtapa or Barra Patosi.  Though it got a bit crowded at the southern end when the buses arrived, it was nothing like the masses that accumulate at Ixtapa and Los Gatos.

554503898.name: LOVE Zihuatanejo!
554503898.author: a TripAdvisor user
554503898.reviewBody: Zihuatanejo has  a small fishing village feel, love it. Very quiet at night, great beaches. Wonderful people and a lively old town with all supplies if one needs anything. There are ruins to see outside Zihu, lots to see and do. Wonderful place to get away to.

553053054.name: Honeymoon
553053054.author: a TripAdvisor user
553053054.reviewBody: Beautiful clean, warm water like nothing we have ever experienced. Most enchanting water in paradise

552555393.name: Lovely, soft sandy beach
552555393.author: a TripAdvisor user
552555393.reviewBody: This beach was bustling all day. There are several places to parasail, beach bars, massages, music, food vendors, and the water is warm. Great place to catch a sunset.

551781238.name: Gorgeous beach!
551781238.author: a TripAdvisor user
551781238.reviewBody: Excellent beach with nice, calm water. Definitely worth the taxi fare from Ixtapa, where the waves are much rougher!

551497959.name: Beautiful and Tranquil
551497959.author: a TripAdvisor user
551497959.reviewBody: This beach offers everything without being too party oriented. The mornings are filled with lapping waves on a sandy 2 km shore. Runners, walkers, fishers, swimmers and paddle boarders grace the scene. As afternoons come alive, many families descend on the various cafes and beach spots to enjoy their day. And the evening sunsets are spectacular. There are many eateries and villas to choose from. Enjoy!

551384933.name: Perfect weather
551384933.author: a TripAdvisor user
551384933.reviewBody: Nice bay, great for families. Can get busy on weekends, but quiet in weekdays. The water is clear and warm. You can do a little snorkelling too where there are some rocks off to one side.

551185547.name: Best beach in the Zihuatanejo Bay
551185547.author: a TripAdvisor user
551185547.reviewBody: We spent about 5 hours at the beach. It was fairly busy but could easily be called \u201clively\u201d. My daughter and I took a parasailing ride each, which cost 300 pesos each. I thought it was well organized and safe, with a consistent and gentle breeze and watching a dozen smooth take offs and landings we decided to give it a shot.  Well worth the $15US.\nWe sat at a little beach side restaurant and had fresh sea food, Coronas and margaritas, dipped in the lovely warm water and took a stroll. I would estimate that 90% of the beach goers were local or visiting Mexicans. There were only very few beach vendors. If you are staying in the Bay, this is an easy choice for an afternoon at the beach.

550294383.name: One of the beach options in Zihuatanejo within walking distance
550294383.author: a TripAdvisor user
550294383.reviewBody: I did prefer the beach La Madera on the other side. This access to this one was a very steep walk down a hill.

550101039.name: Fun!
550101039.author: a TripAdvisor user
550101039.reviewBody: Lively! Busy at Christmas! Safe! Family friendly! Small waves. Sandy bottom in the water. Loved having the restaurants right on the beach!

549595698.name: La Ropa Beach is La Crowded Beach
549595698.author: a TripAdvisor user
549595698.reviewBody: This beach is the destination for wealthy Mexico City resident. While it once may have been serene it is now over-run. Umbrellas and tables make their way right to the water\u2019s edge, making it near impossible to even walk the length of the beach. The local families, as lovely as they are, blare their music at high levels. I love accordion music as much as the next guy, but it is really too much. One recommendation: the far end of the beach (north end) is much quieter. If you can make your way past the mass of humanity and get all the way down to the very end, you may be able to have a reasonably relaxing afternoon.

548615235.name: Great beach for kids
548615235.author: a TripAdvisor user
548615235.reviewBody: We stayed here all day with our kids, ages 3 and 5.  It was great because we could rent umbrellas and chairs for shade and rest and then have the wonderful beach with gentle waves for playing and swimming.  You can walk out quite a ways before you will be in over your head.  Lots of pelicans diving for fish and activities for the kids to watch (parasailing, etc).

548513484.name: Great beach
548513484.author: a TripAdvisor user
548513484.reviewBody: One of the nicest beaches on the Pacific Coast c/w palm trees, golden sands, safe swimming, various rentals if so inclined.  Great food and bars discreetly positioned. Some vendors.\nWalkable (if energetic) from Zihua Centro but cheap cabs approx 50 pesos and even cheaper micros 8.5 pesos. Ocean is safe and maybe cleaner than Madera although we swim in both places.

548457636.name: Something for everyone
548457636.author: a TripAdvisor user
548457636.reviewBody: This beach has it all, decent swimming, massages, trinket sales, restaurants, nice boutique hotels, activities, and really decent sand. This is a beach for all if you can\'t find a way to be happy on this beach you are trying to be unhappy. The only thing this beach lacks is a decent sunset. But if you are in Zihuatanejo you must visit La Ropa.

547941979.name: Tranquil
547941979.author: a TripAdvisor user
547941979.reviewBody:
Had a very short stay but didn't pass up the opportunity to visit.
Nice firm sand on the darker side unllke the pristine white you get when you get outside the bay area. Gentle waves and crystal clear water perfect for snorkeling.
Gets plenty crowded on a saturday or sunday but still plenty of room for taking a relaxing swim.
Easy to get to obly a short walk from most resorts. Plenty of things to see and do once you've finished in the water with specialty stores and eateries a stone's throw from the water.
I think the council needs to address the pollution that tends to come ashore. I saw plenty of plastic bags, bottles and bottle caps strewn across the dry sand areas of the beach which took some of the shine away from the otherwise idyllic setting.

547923500.name: Enjoy the beach and lots of stops!
547923500.author: a TripAdvisor user
547923500.reviewBody: This beach is full of great spots to sit or set up towels, umbrella and relax or play in the water.  Get a massage from Monse and you will thank me!!!

547882136.name: Beautiful beach
547882136.author: a TripAdvisor user
547882136.reviewBody:
Near our hotel, La Casa Que Canta, we do morning walks along the mile long beach daily.  Many resorts are located on the beach and this is a place for the locals to come especially on weekends.  Since it`s inside a  bay, the water is calm and there is decent snorkelling at both ends in shallow waters.
In the 17th century, a Manilla galleon shipwrecked with a cargo of silk and fine clothing from the Orient which washed up on shore; thus, it was named La Playa la Ropa, the beach of the clothes.  Since, the name has been shortened to Playa la Ropa.

546778449.name: We stayed in a condo nearby...
546778449.author: a TripAdvisor user
546778449.reviewBody: I walked the beach a few times. Mostly in the morning.  Very soft sand. Really enjoyed the wave sounds. There are many places to eat.  For a few pesos, you can sit, eat , drink and enjoy the wonderful beach. Simply paradise.

546680617.name: Visited friend
546680617.author: a TripAdvisor user
546680617.reviewBody: Good everyday beach, little dirty and water not as clean as expected. But will be able to mingle with locals and hard core visitors.

546440556.name: Busiest beach around
546440556.author: a TripAdvisor user
546440556.reviewBody: Maybe it was because it was a Saturday, maybe because closer to high season.  But this beach was crazy busy, prices for all food and drink are higher than all other beaches.  In the end, this is the last beach I\'d consider.  Go to las Gatas or stick closer to town.

546398008.name: Great Mexican Beach
546398008.author: a TripAdvisor user
546398008.reviewBody: Great beach for walking. My wife and I loved it and the views were gorgeous. Sunsets were especially nice around 6. Several places to eat of all price ranges (anywhere from 150-800 pesos for two with drinks). I would strongly recommend having Mexican pesos. Had several massages for about the equivalent of $11 US. Had some of the most amazing octopus dishes with my toes in the sand. My wife really liked the Coco Loco served in a real coconut.  I believe there is a place called Patty\u2019s that had all day 2 for 1 drinks and had the best deals on food. There are opportunities to rent paddle boards for $200 pesos and you can also parasail.

546307162.name: Best water ever
546307162.author: a TripAdvisor user
546307162.reviewBody: Best waves best temperature nicest water I\u2019ve ever been in. Sandy sandy sandy no sharks no rocks just beautiful.

546110035.name: Amazing beach!
546110035.author: a TripAdvisor user
546110035.reviewBody: This was my favorite beach in Zihu! The water is so warm with gentle waves and very little under currents. The beach is great for walking. Many beach side resturants and bars that provide nice shade from the sun.

545112013.name: Wonderful Beach
545112013.author: a TripAdvisor user
545112013.reviewBody: Playa La Ropa is sort of an idyllic stretch of beach and ocean along Zihuatanejo Bay. The sure is not rough (in contrast to Ixtapa and other beaches directly on the Pacific Ocean. On the weekends, especially Sundays, it is filled with people ( lots of families) and is a wonderful experience. I should also note that the water is warm and pleasant.

544679387.name: Beautiful white packed sand
544679387.author: a TripAdvisor user
544679387.reviewBody: Great long beach for a walk. Good place for kids. Lots of rentals for beach fun. Nice beachside lunch places. Parasailing, banana boats etc.

544513695.name: Beautiful Beach
544513695.author: a TripAdvisor user
544513695.reviewBody: This beach is about as good as it gets!  A beautiful bay, nice sand, gentle slope and waves and lots of activities - from walking the beach to great massages to lounging and eating food and drinking a cold beer.  It is only about a mile long, but otherwise it is great.

544477973.name: Great location, very walkable
544477973.author: a TripAdvisor user
544477973.reviewBody: Love Love love Zihuatenajo.  Small, walk-able but with good taxi\'s.  Been here close to 10 times, 1st more than 10 years ago.  Still a quaint smallish, inexpensive, casual town, many good restaurants on the beach.  Town closes up early so if you want night life, will have to go to Ixtapa which is only 15-20 minutes by cab.  I will be going again in April 2018.

544105911.name: The best beach in all of Zihua
544105911.author: a TripAdvisor user
544105911.reviewBody: Playa Ropa has everything you want and nothing you don\'t.  Beautiful sand, plenty of shade options for a small tip, more than a mile to stroll.  Food and drink are available.  There are local hawkers selling massages (200 pesos or about $10 USD for a 1 hour massage), silver, pottery, and other trinkets.  They are nearly universal unobtrustive and a simple "no gracias" is all that you need if you are not interested.

544066553.name: Relaxing and wonderful beach
544066553.author: a TripAdvisor user
544066553.reviewBody: From sporting to sipping drinks, you can do anything you want on this beach. People were swimming late into the night as we dined nearby one night, love it here!!! Heaven on earth.

543634175.name: Beautiful stretch of beach for water fun, or an evening sunset stroll.
543634175.author: a TripAdvisor user
543634175.reviewBody: The beach is very open, with soft sand, gentle waves and clear water.  Lots of activities to entertain you.  Parasailing, Towed Inflatables, Jet Skis and Paddle Boards available to rent among other things.  There is some snorkeling waters available around the rocks at the southern end that separate La Ropa from Las Gatas Beach.  Numerous eateries along the beach with palapas to grab Cervezas and food in the shade.  Also a great place to take a sunset stroll and enjoy the peace and quiet after crowds go home.

543171225.name: Beautiful Beach, ocean is very safe, water is crystal clear.
543171225.author: a TripAdvisor user
543171225.reviewBody: Excellent beach for all the family. Some activities like Jetski and Catamaran to be rented right on the beach. Nice athmosphere. Night on the beach is also magical.

541961549.name: Beautiful beach
541961549.author: a TripAdvisor user
541961549.reviewBody: Nice spot, great beach, 200 peso massages, great marguritas at Rossi\'s ( sit upstairs for a view and nice breeze)

541628243.name: Lunch at El Manglar
541628243.author: a TripAdvisor user
541628243.reviewBody: Great 5 star restaurant near the beach. Nearby stream with geckos and birds made in entertaining. Good food and atmosphere. Close walk to beach.

540527597.name: La Perla Goodness!
540527597.author: a TripAdvisor user
540527597.reviewBody: Playa La Ropa was one of our favorite beaches in Ixtapa-Zihuatanejo it was quiet and swimmable.  Make sure you rent a place to sit at La Perla it only costs one hundred pesos to sit on brand new chairs under an umbrella for shade.  Everyone says La Perla is very tasty but we only were there for a short while after eating at LOOT so we had ice creme and water beachside which was pretty cool.  I honestly love Zihuatanejo because the vendors on the beach are selling all kinds of different things that I\'ve\' seen so far from all of our travels in Mexico. There is peanut vendors, ice creme vendors, guitarist, massages on the beach, you name it they are selling it.  Pretty interesting place and very quite full of locals, would come back here to swim and do some water sports next time I\'m in Zihua.

540317015.name: Really sweet white sand beach!
540317015.author: a TripAdvisor user
540317015.reviewBody: I went out to this beach, probably about 3 miles or so from downtown Zihua with a couple from my hotel.  We spent several hours there, went into the water a number of times, had a great lunch at Paty Miramar restaurant on the beach, and spent just a very delightful several hours.  The lady from the couple I went with also got a massage on the beach from one of the masseuses, and was quite happy with it.  A "must visit" spot when in Zihua!

539280233.name: Beautiful views, great swimming
539280233.author: a TripAdvisor user
539280233.reviewBody: Gorgeous does not describe the view.  The water is fabulous for swimming, very warm, lots of sand and not crowed.  Heaven.

538510902.name: The wave has already crested
538510902.author: a TripAdvisor user
538510902.reviewBody: La Ropa is in its sunset. What once was a charming beach and relaxed business area now is becoming dated, too crowded and too commercial. The traffic is a nightmare if you want to go to and from town, or just walk the road.\nThat being said, if you never knew it in :the old days", it still has plenty to offer.

538321302.name: Nice little beach
538321302.author: a TripAdvisor user
538321302.reviewBody: This is a beautiful little beach highly recommended by the locals. Much nicer than the beach at Ixtapa. Great little beach restaurants and great prices and service. If you want a nice relaxing massage there are a number of places right on the beach and they are quite good. Negotiate beforehand for the price and duration. If parasailing is on your bucket list, this service is also available and they are quite skilled at their craft. The beach itself is very nice to walk or go for your morning jog on. The view is spectacular and you can also go snorkeling right there off the beach or take a tour.

538286459.name: Great long beach
538286459.author: a TripAdvisor user
538286459.reviewBody: Love this spot, so much better than the busy Ixtapa beaches. There are no big waves and the temperature of the water is mild most of the year.

535495193.name: Morning walk on the beach.
535495193.author: a TripAdvisor user
535495193.reviewBody: We walked the full length of Playa La Ropa and then back to our hotel.  It was a quiet early morning with only a few other walkers.  Only thing we noticed since our visit ten years ago,  so much plastic on the beach. Much like other beaches around the world it was littered with plastic bottle caps, bottles, bottle rings and other bits and pieces. So sad.

534586589.name: Beach day
534586589.author: a TripAdvisor user
534586589.reviewBody: Spent a fabulous day on Playa la Ropa. Lounged under an umbrella with cold beverages and watched the waves roll in. Water temp was great. Beautiful beach!

533474187.name: amazing tranquil ocean.
533474187.author: a TripAdvisor user
533474187.reviewBody: The water is warm and tranquil. It has a sandy beach, which makes it perfect. There are plenty of restaurants to get food and drinks. Very family oriented with some parasailing spots available.

532911861.name: Okay beach
532911861.author: a TripAdvisor user
532911861.reviewBody: We liked this beach the least out of the 3 we visited. We liked Playa la Madera and Los Gato\'s much better.

530237440.name: long sandy beach with restaurants and boat rentals
530237440.author: a TripAdvisor user
530237440.reviewBody: just down the beach from Embarc Hotel.  You can get a massage, rent a sailboat, swim or snorkel. You can also walk from this beach to the town of ZI along a beachfront walkway but need to walk to the main road to get around a rocky point.

528793872.name: Favorite beach in town
528793872.author: a TripAdvisor user
528793872.reviewBody: I love packing up the beach gear and heading over here. Nice big beach and usually isn\'t very crowded.

527433166.name: Z 2017
527433166.author: a TripAdvisor user
527433166.reviewBody: Massages on the beach, lunch and drinks at La Perla.  Vendors constantly walking up to you trying to sell things.

522995076.name: Beautiful Pacific Coast!
522995076.author: a TripAdvisor user
522995076.reviewBody: Beautiful sand and water. Lovely views. I walked on the beach and got a 1 hour massage for 200 pesos. Amazing!

517501444.name: Cute little beach in Zih Bay
517501444.author: a TripAdvisor user
517501444.reviewBody: Great place to grab sun, calm ocean and some great places to spend the day. Can get crowded on weekends or during the busy season.

512345675.name: Perfect crescent
512345675.author: a TripAdvisor user
512345675.reviewBody: This beach is beautiful. Textbook! Lots of people in stretches near carparks but plenty of open spaces anyway. The water is warm and clear enough to see a small manta ray about our tootsies.

512225144.name: Family friendly beach away from the crowds
512225144.author: a TripAdvisor user
512225144.reviewBody: This beach has few amenities or shops, but is perfect for couples and families looking to relax and enjoy the water without crowds. The restaurants and service in the area are friendly, casual, and comfortable, with several options for elevated dining available on the beach and nearby. Places to stay in la Ropa are pricier but well worth the views and the comfort. A short 5-10 minute bus or taxi ride will take you into Zihua for shopping or an evening stroll. The best location for families or couples looking for a quiet getaway.

510600291.name: Beaches n brews
510600291.author: a TripAdvisor user
510600291.reviewBody: An amazing semi virgen beach with amazing views , there are a couple of restaurants with AMAZING food & tortillas made by hand .

509367359.name: My new favorite beach in Mexico!
509367359.author: a TripAdvisor user
509367359.reviewBody: Stayed at Embarc Zihuatanejo on Playa la Ropa.  This truly is a gem in Mexico!!  Kinda want to keep quiet about it because I don\'t want it to get crazy crowded like other spots in Mexico.

507208550.name: Clean and fun
507208550.author: a TripAdvisor user
507208550.reviewBody: We had a fun time, as well as an acceptable culinary experience. The beach was clean as far as I could see, and the ocean wasn\'t too rowdy. Many services were offered, and those we became clients of were of good to really good quality.

505535467.name: Awesome!! Best beach -Not crowded
505535467.author: a TripAdvisor user
505535467.reviewBody:
Loved this beach!!
It has everything you want or need.

Restaurants, chair and shade rentals. Massages on the beach, jet ski rentals, banana rides, parasailing etc.

Not crowded and good family environment.  We had teens and small children, all enjoyed it here.

We shall be back!

499423826.name: Perfect
499423826.author: a TripAdvisor user
499423826.reviewBody: This is the most beautiful beach in Zihuatanejo, with it\'s white sandy beach and gentle waves. Always clean and a local favorite. Mrs. B and I spend many hours enjoying the people, the warm ocean, and the bright sun. You will find a great many activites for rent along the beach if you tire of laying around.

498407588.name: Playa la Ropa
498407588.author: a TripAdvisor user
498407588.reviewBody: A beautiful beach, loaded with restaurants. Good swimming and snorkelling. An easy walk from the beach to the village for shopping.

498226157.name: Beautiful beach but lacks charm
498226157.author: a TripAdvisor user
498226157.reviewBody: My wife and I are staying on the beach where Aura Del Mar Hotel is located, and no question on first glance the beach there is no where near as nice as Playa Rosa.   However after spending part of a day on Playa Rosa, we looked at each other, and both agreed we wanted to return back to our beach.  Why?  Hard to describe, but we just had a better vibe on our beach, more local tourists there, which added to the charm, better waves for activities, and closer to town, and the pier, so not as isolated.   Just my observation, and I\'m sure many would prefer Playa Ropa.  I guess it depends on the type of travel you enjoy, and we enjoy getting amongst local activities.

497673821.name: Quiet little beach near the Pacifica Grand Resort.
497673821.author: a TripAdvisor user
497673821.reviewBody: You can play in the water, rent a WaveRunner (Inexpensive), rent a paddle board, parasail, ride in a sailboat or a Hobie Cat, or just sit and have a cerveza and a shrimp cocktail and watch everyone else do those things.  This is a fabulous little beach that is actually close to nothing in particular.  There are a few little shops nearby where you can buy some t-shirts or other little souvenirs.

497189636.name: Relaxing and beautiful...
497189636.author: a TripAdvisor user
497189636.reviewBody: Playa la Ropa is a beautiful beach. Very clean for the most part, only found a few pieces of trash here and there. No shells and a sandy bottom beach (very odd rock or sea grass). Lots of restaurants to chose from, and your normal array of water activities. The vendors weren\'t very pushy, a simple "no thank you" and they went on their way. The waves can get bigger than you might expect, and the undertow strong for such a little cove. We always felt safe walking the beach whether day or night. Very enjoyable overall.

494399639.name: Not Nearly As Beautiful As Gulf Coast Beaches... lots of trash
494399639.author: a TripAdvisor user
494399639.reviewBody: The worst part about this beach is the fact that you are constantly accosted for massages, parasailing, boat excursions, etc. EVERY time you walk the beach, the exact same people approach you trying to sell you services. This is a narrow beach... no shells... lots of trash... great for early morning, late afternoon strolls, but not in the league of many other beaches in the country.

491630912.name: Relax listening to the waves
491630912.author: a TripAdvisor user
491630912.reviewBody: What a nice beach.  A combination of tourists and locals laze in the sun and enjoy the gentle waves in the cove.  Several small restaurants dot the beach and you can get a massage, ride jet skis, parasail or get aboard a banana boat.  It\'s all good here.

490459289.name: Pleasant Morning Walk
490459289.author: a TripAdvisor user
490459289.reviewBody: This is a great beach for families as the water is shallow. We went for a walk early in the morning for the feel of the cool sand under our feet and there were already quite a few people out strolling or having breakfast at one of the restaurants lining the beach. Sunsets are lovely, but one thing to note, this is not a private beach at all, it\'s always crowded!

483331474.name: White sand, Blue sky, aquamarine water and Sunset spectacular!
483331474.author: a TripAdvisor user
483331474.reviewBody: Bustling tourists, variety of activities, restaurants, massage by the beach, beach combing, walking in the sands, playing with the waves, jumping fish, watching spectacular sunset ahhh pure bliss!

482492412.name: With the walk
482492412.author: a TripAdvisor user
482492412.reviewBody: After the sun started to lose a little heat we decided it was a short walk from La Madera Beach to La Ropa Beach.  It was worth the walk even if I felt it was mostly up hill. HA... it was beautiful and I really think the beer could be better there.  The sunset was pretty and it would even be better at a different time of the year, but a big hill took a lot of the view.   For e the beach is better at La Ropa.\nPeople were having fun in the sand.

480638475.name: Beautiful beach & delicious food only steps away
480638475.author: a TripAdvisor user
480638475.reviewBody: Eat breakfast at a beach side restaurant & you have the use of lounge chairs for the day. Take a walk down the beach & compare prices for parasailing - magnificent view & not scary at all.

479850498.name: Perfect white Sandy beach
479850498.author: a TripAdvisor user
479850498.reviewBody: Fabulous beach,  about 1mile long , beautiful white sands, caf\u00e9,  on the beach, try the Hoby Cat, paddle boarding, fishing, and Para sailing , all attractions to hire, several first class restaurants,rite on the beach, ....very clean, as they have someone clean any rubbish floating into shore . ....well worth a visit .

479606228.name: Wow!!!
479606228.author: a TripAdvisor user
479606228.reviewBody: Compare to Ixtapa, this beach is quiet and the waves are smoother (still strong). \n\nRemember that it is a public beach and on holidays can be crowded. It is also the Pacific ocean=not that warm, but you get used to.

479504181.name: A beautiful long beach in a deep bay of the Pacific
479504181.author: a TripAdvisor user
479504181.reviewBody: This is a beautiful beach in the deep bay of Zihauatanejo. There are many restaurants to eat at and calm water for swimming. It can be crowded and dirty on major holidays but is a wonderful place to relax otherwise. During the winter when the sun sets over the water, the sunsets are beautiful and may have a green flash.

478920241.name: Busy but fun
478920241.author: a TripAdvisor user
478920241.reviewBody: You can expect a ton of locals out here, but they are typically just soaking up the sun like the rest of us. The vendors aren\'t nearly as bad as your typical touristy spots like Cancun or Cabo, either. Waves were choppier than I expected considering it\'s lind of "coved in", but still swimable and open to various water activities such as paddle boarding and jet skiing. Was fairly clean as well.

478274698.name: Beutiful Beach
478274698.author: a TripAdvisor user
478274698.reviewBody: Probably one of my favourite beaches of all time. This beach is clean, soft sand, and the water is very nice.

476108854.name: Beach, sunny, waves, heaven
476108854.author: a TripAdvisor user
476108854.reviewBody: Love this beach!!!   About a 20 minute walk from Playa Madera.  \nLots of space and comfy sunning options.  Vendors and food all around.  I highly recommend this beach for family, couples and friends.  I will certainly return.

475856293.name: Best beach around
475856293.author: a TripAdvisor user
475856293.reviewBody: Great beach.  Sandy, not that rocky.  Shallow for about 25 yards out.  Lots of food and drink options available.  Great walk around the bay as well.

475559421.name: Best beach on the west coast of mexico
475559421.author: a TripAdvisor user
475559421.reviewBody: we have traveled the west coast of the pacific Alaska to South America by Motor Home. While la Ropa is not the best in  the world, it has a place in the best of Mexico category.

475226044.name: Sunday night walk on the beach
475226044.author: a TripAdvisor user
475226044.reviewBody: We had a great walk on Playa la Ropa. We went in the evening and did not have plans to stay and play in the water or partake of the local fare. The walk was lovely and much fun due to the families playing in the water and having a fantastic time. We could see the beach from the balcony of our room and from La Vista restaurant. There are lots of restaurants, live music, great places to sit with table side service. Paragliding and torpedo rides. It is an active beach with shouts of laughter and fun emanating throughout the day.

474811879.name: Best Beach in the area for watersports
474811879.author: a TripAdvisor user
474811879.reviewBody: Playa La Ropa is known for its clean beach and gentle waves.  There are plenty of beaches in the area and Playa Blanca is a fantastic beach but if you like the water and want to get in it if it is windy, this is the beach.  The others are frankly dangerous even for those like me that are very comfortable in any body of water.  Ropa has all the activities you would want from jet skis, to parasailing to standup paddle boards, etc. Fantastic local restaurants and some 5-star dining as well.  Yes there are some folks selling trinkets and massages but frankly they are just doing there job and never bothered me.  I used two different massage tents and both were excellent/professional 60 min for $10.50 plus tip.  Half dozen locally operated restaurants and the Viceroy Hotel as the best option for overnight accommodations and you have one heck of a great beach.  Super clean sand and water as well.

474280803.name: Absolute paradise with some fun added in!
474280803.author: a TripAdvisor user
474280803.reviewBody: On the weekdays you felt like you were on a fairly private beach - a bit busier on weekend.  Nice quiet walk on the beach, stand up paddle boards, body surf the nice waves, or parasail, jet ski, or kayak - you can it all!

474226519.name: Best beach in Zihua area
474226519.author: a TripAdvisor user
474226519.reviewBody:
We spend the day at La Perla restaurant on this beach and we really enjoyed it.

It's the nicest beach for swimming and relaxing in the area. Gentle waves and clean and soft sand. 

It was a welcome change from the huge waves from our hotel's beach in Ixtapa. La Ropa is much nicer for families with young kids or for people who are afraid of strong current like myself. In my opinion, this is the nicest area in Zihuatanejo.

472738088.name: Beautiful Beach
472738088.author: a TripAdvisor user
472738088.reviewBody: Playa la Ropa is a beautiful beach with lots of palapas (little restaurants) all along it.  The swimming is wonderful!

472524604.name: Our favorite beach in Zihuatanejo
472524604.author: a TripAdvisor user
472524604.reviewBody: A beautiful beach with enough waves for those that like to body surf (none that were too aggressive when we were there).  There were some very good places to grab lounge chairs and food/drink, as well (La Perla & Marimar especially).

471993533.name: Another great beach in Zihua
471993533.author: a TripAdvisor user
471993533.reviewBody: Clean, wide, comfortable. Great amenities around, safe, and the water\'s not rough. Good to relax and it wasn\'t crowded

471919178.name: Really lovely beach
471919178.author: a TripAdvisor user
471919178.reviewBody: Fabulous soft sand, clear water and very safe, with lots of bars & restaurants for snacks and light lunches. You can also get a massage on the beach

471882900.name: Fun Day at the beach
471882900.author: a TripAdvisor user
471882900.reviewBody: We enjoyed quiet a few hours at La Pearla for lunch and lots of cervezas.  The staff was excellant and food was great.  Thanks for the fun time.

471699294.name: Great beach, best snorkeling at North end.
471699294.author: a TripAdvisor user
471699294.reviewBody: Great beach with restaurants from cheap to expensive, nice sand, good swimming. \n\nBut the best snorkeling in the bay is at the North end of La Ropa right next to the South side of the rocks on the point just past the Embarc resort. Don\'t be afraid ot getting close to the rocks, that\'s where the little canyons and fish are.

471519210.name: Good time
471519210.author: a TripAdvisor user
471519210.reviewBody: Nice beach! Rented a table and chairs for 9 people for 100 pesos. You can also order from one of the restaurants and they will let you sit there. Plenty of vendors walking around, places to get massage. Kids loved it

471484139.name: Great beach
471484139.author: a TripAdvisor user
471484139.reviewBody: nice little waves, perfect for body surfing.  one of my favorite beaches in the world!  We will be back again for sure!

471428528.name: Beautiful swimming bay.
471428528.author: a TripAdvisor user
471428528.reviewBody: Lovely spot with lots of places to eat or just sit and sun.\nAlso many places to stay with good accommodations.  All price ranges.

471231358.name: Laid back, relaxing and clean
471231358.author: a TripAdvisor user
471231358.reviewBody: I love this beach.  Everyone was respectful of everyone else\'s space.  Beach was clean and the water picture perfect.

469932600.name: Excellent paddle boarding location!
469932600.author: a TripAdvisor user
469932600.reviewBody:
We are staying in Ixtapa where the surf is a bit dangerous. It was fun to bus to ZIH, then walked out to Playa La Ropa so we could explore.

We took the first beach turn into Playa La Ropa at the Las Casa Que Canta down the very, very steep cobblestone pedestrian-only street to the beach stairs. In front of a condo development under a few trees we found our paddle board rental (there are others).

We rented paddle boards for two hours which was enough time to explore the entire bay (over to the water taxi pier, back among the fishing boats, up the North side, across to Playa Las Gatas (enter safely on the left of the bay beside the pier) and back to return. Bring WATER or money with you! Also don't make our rookie mistake and sunblock your feet too!

First offer was $20 per hour per board, we paid $50 for two for two hours which was likely high, but they need to make a living and things were quiet mid-week. 

Swimming is lovely at the beach, restaurants welcoming and clean ... what a beautiful location.

469696853.name: Great days on the beach
469696853.author: a TripAdvisor user
469696853.reviewBody: Our mornings consisted of trecking to the beach finding some loungers in front of one of the restaurants and ordering drinks and food all day long! A bucket of beer and people watching seem to go hand in hand

469514873.name: Nice Beach
469514873.author: a TripAdvisor user
469514873.reviewBody: The best beach in Zihua. Busy on weekends with many locals coming to the beach during the day. Excellent, shallow approach for swimming. All the touristy stuff like parasailing, jet skis, etc. Not the place if you want a beach to yourself but many bars and restaurants to treat yourself to.

469133745.name: We Love this Beach!
469133745.author: a TripAdvisor user
469133745.reviewBody: You can either lay in the sun or stay active with swimming, snorkelling, or volleyball. There are plenty of operators for motorized water sports - or rent a kayak or paddleboard and paddle around the bay!

469128017.name: Beautiful Beach
469128017.author: a TripAdvisor user
469128017.reviewBody: Playa La Ropa is by far the nicest in Zihuatanejo. It is protected from the open ocean so it is fine for swimming.  It is great for walking on the beach and has interesting restaurants and places to stay.  The views are spectacular.

468652083.name: Tranquil and Friendly Beach
468652083.author: a TripAdvisor user
468652083.reviewBody: Playa la Ropa is a very nice beach to walk.  It is never all that crowded, and even the hawkers are friendly and not overly-aggressive.  The water and waves are suited for all ages, and the typical activities you would expect are all there for you to enjoy...even if you are not staying near or on Playa la Ropa, you should try and make it a point to visit, even if it\'s just a couple hours.

468582816.name: Quaint & Quiet
468582816.author: a TripAdvisor user
468582816.reviewBody: Wonderful to get away from crowds.\nThe water is warm year round with gentle waves. Great swim and wading beach. There is interesting snorkeling and surfing nearby. The beach is very safe with wonderful friendly local vendors and great places to eat and drink.

468485789.name: LaRopa
468485789.author: a TripAdvisor user
468485789.reviewBody:
🏖🌴👍🏽
Beautiful beach, scenery food!
Had a great time .. don't forget to 
walk the beach at night !!

468310144.name: Gorgeous
468310144.author: a TripAdvisor user
468310144.reviewBody: We stayed on his beach. Nice people and great water for swimming and mini surfing. Quiet and so pretty.

468075207.name: This IS the beach in Zihau!
468075207.author: a TripAdvisor user
468075207.reviewBody: Loved walking from Madera area, to LaRopa. You can take a shortcut, just beyond the Sunset Grill Restaurant, down a sweet shady, cobblestone lane. I searched for the best spot, and found Hotel Del Mar, Arena Restaurant. For 150 pesos, you can rent two lounge chairs, with cushions and umbrella for the entire day. There are clean restrooms, a resident parrot, and the best service provided by Eric. It is next to Mangler, and close to Rossys.\nHave a massage for 200 pesos, go para sailing, or just swim in the warm, beautiful water. This was, in my opinion, the most quiet, relaxing place. Also, check out the crocs, turtles, iguanas, and birds, behind the kitchen. The breakfast was very good to begin a day in the sun.

467923957.name: Gorgeous spot for a day on the beach.
467923957.author: a TripAdvisor user
467923957.reviewBody: We spend a lovely day on Playa la Ropa.  For a very reasonable price, you can "rent" a beach chair under an umbrella for the day and enjoy the breeze, an occasional dip in the ocean and a couple of nice cold beers.  We loved it!

466986198.name: Beautiful beach.
466986198.author: a TripAdvisor user
